name: part_004
file: tmp_【#ちょこ先生誕2021】ちょこ先生の3Dお誕生日会【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [p9k8A3XzH68]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Choco-sensei performs a gesture game in a stadium setting, imitating Houshou Marine.
Choco-sensei 'cooks' Subaru in a kitchen setting, turning her into Peking Duck.

subtitles.original: にーにー、えちち、あくと、あくと！
subtitles.english: Nee-nee, etiti, akuto, akuto!

subtitles.original: 頑張れ、チョコ先！
subtitles.english: Go for it, Choco-sen!

subtitles.original: 宝鐘マリン船長！あはははは！
subtitles.english: Captain Houshou Marine! Ahahaha!

subtitles.original: お！チョコ先終わったよ！
subtitles.english: Oh! Choco-sen, you're finished!

subtitles.original: ちょっとまだやり足りない？マリン船長まだやり足りない？
subtitles.english: Do you still want to do more? Are you not satisfied with Marine-sencho?

subtitles.original: 宝鐘マリンです！イヤァァァ！
subtitles.english: I'm Houshou Marine! Iyaaaa!

subtitles.original: これ馬鹿怒られるからやめよう、マジこれ馬鹿怒られるから本当に！
subtitles.english: I'll get really scolded for this, so I'll stop. Seriously, I'll get scolded!

subtitles.original: 答え：宝鐘マリン
subtitles.english: Answer: Houshou Marine

subtitles.original: はい！ということで、答えはマリン船長でした！
subtitles.english: Yes! So, the answer was Captain Marine!

subtitles.original: あれ？チョコ先これ…
subtitles.english: Wait, Choco-sen, this...

subtitles.original: ということでね、スバル、ジェスチャーゲーム、死にそうやんお前！
subtitles.english: Anyway, Subaru... the gesture game... you look like you're dying!

subtitles.original: はい！ということでスバル様、ちょっとこっち来て？
subtitles.english: Alright! Anyway, Subaru-sama, come over here for a bit?

subtitles.original: あ、ありがと！元に戻してくれるの？
subtitles.english: Ah, thanks! You're going to put me back to normal?

subtitles.original: スバル、おいでこっち。元にちょっと…スバル、バックでしか歩行できないから！ちょっとね、まだこの身体慣れてないんだよ！
subtitles.english: Subaru, come here. Wait... Subaru can only walk backwards! I'm not used to this body yet!

subtitles.original: スバルの姿、元の姿に戻してくん、チョコ先！
subtitles.english: Put me back into my original Subaru form, Choco-sen!

subtitles.original: わかった、わかった。
subtitles.english: Got it, got it.

subtitles.original: ありがと、ありがと！
subtitles.english: Thanks, thanks!

subtitles.original: スバル、おいで。
subtitles.english: Subaru, come here.

subtitles.original: ありがと、ありがと！やっぱりチョコ先生は優しいんだなぁ！
subtitles.english: Thanks, thanks! Choco-sensei is so kind after all!

subtitles.original: さてと、まあこれでね、食材調達もできたことだし、早速料理していきましょうかね！
subtitles.english: Well then, now that we've got the ingredients, let's go and cook right away!

subtitles.original: え？ほら、スバル、おいで。
subtitles.english: Eh? Come on, Subaru, come here.

subtitles.original: あ、じゃあ皆さん！スバル、じゃあまたね！ありがとうございます！お邪魔しました！
subtitles.english: Ah, everyone! Subaru will... see you later! Thank you! Sorry for intruding!

subtitles.original: みんな、また後でね！あ！すり抜けていく！バイバイ！
subtitles.english: Everyone, see you later! Ah! I'm phasing through! Bye bye!

subtitles.original: よしよし、スバル、可愛いねぇ。わいわい！今日どこ行くの？今日どこ行くの？
subtitles.english: Alright, alright, Subaru, you're so cute. Yay! Where are we going today? Where are we going today?

subtitles.original: 今日は魔界の遊園地行くのよ、スバル。
subtitles.english: We're going to the Underworld Amusement Park today, Subaru.

subtitles.original: 遊園地！いいねいいね！
subtitles.english: Amusement park! Nice, nice!

subtitles.original: いや、魔界の遊園地といえばね、なんと目玉は…お化け屋敷！
subtitles.english: Well, speaking of the Underworld Amusement Park... the main attraction is... the Ghost Mansion!

subtitles.original: おぉー！いいねいいね！お化け屋敷！いいねいいね！
subtitles.english: Ohhh! Nice, nice! Ghost mansion! Nice, nice!

subtitles.original: スバルもお化けになってみたい？
subtitles.english: Subaru, do you want to try being a ghost too?

subtitles.original: あ！驚かす側ってこと？いいね！
subtitles.english: Ah! You mean the one who scares people? Nice!

subtitles.original: うん！じゃあお化けになってもらいたいか、スバルは…
subtitles.english: Yeah! Well then, I want Subaru to become a ghost...

subtitles.original: お化け役やってみたい！
subtitles.english: I want to try being a ghost!

subtitles.original: じゃあチョコがその願い叶えてあげましょう！ちょっと待って危ない危ない、それは危ない、そのテンションで言うことじゃない、それはチョコ先！
subtitles.english: Then Choco will grant that wish! Wait, hold on, that's dangerous. That's not something you say with that tone, Choco-sen!

subtitles.original: 落ち着いてチョコ先マジで！何言ってるのスバル、
subtitles.english: Seriously, calm down Choco-sen! What are you saying, Subaru?

subtitles.original: いやいや危なすぎだろそれ…だってお化けになりたいんでしょ？チョコがだったら叶えてあげるわよ！
subtitles.english: No no, that's way too dangerous... But you wanted to be a ghost, right? Then Choco will grant your wish!

subtitles.original: ちょっ…お前やめっ！せーの、へい！
subtitles.english: Wait... stop it! One, two, hey!

subtitles.original: あぶあぶあぶあぶあぶあぶ！ちょっ…お前やっちゃっ…お前やっちゃってるよお前！アッジェジェ！嘘だろ、な、な、な！
subtitles.english: Whoa whoa whoa! Wait... you're actually doing it! You're actually doing it! Ow ow ow! No way, wait, wait, wait!

subtitles.original: 嘘ね、うん、なんかスバル…危な危なーい来てたわ。
subtitles.english: Oh well. Subaru... that was dangerous.

subtitles.original: 羽毛一枚抜けたぐらいだったわ。
subtitles.english: It was only about one feather that came off.

subtitles.original: 一枚どころじゃねーよお前！
subtitles.english: It wasn't just one feather, you!

subtitles.original: 死者数増やしてんじゃねーよ！まあまあ、そのプリケツこっちに向けなスバル。やってやるよ！いや無理無理無理無理！
subtitles.english: Don't increase the number of deaths! Now, now, turn that plump butt this way, Subaru. I'll do it! No, no, no!

subtitles.original: ほら、せーの！無理やめてやめてやめて！あぶねーな！
subtitles.english: Here, one, two! No, stop it, stop it! Whoa, that was close!

subtitles.original: もう、これ使えないわね、もう。
subtitles.english: Man, I can't use this one anymore.

subtitles.original: 使えないじゃねーんだよお前、そんなことしてるから胸がなおさら減るんだよお前！
subtitles.english: What do you mean 'can't use'!? That's why your chest is shrinking even more!

subtitles.original: え、じゃあこれ取ったらいい？
subtitles.english: Eh, then can I take this?

subtitles.original: いやそれはやめてください危ねーから、マジでいろんな意味で危ねーから！
subtitles.english: No, please stop that, it's dangerous! Seriously, in many ways!

subtitles.original: わかった、じゃあほらスバル、何も持ってないからこっちおいで。
subtitles.english: Alright, then look, Subaru, I don't have anything, so come over here.

subtitles.original: 本当？ほら、ないよ。しょうがないな、まあ誕生日だしね、信じてやるよ二期生の絆！
subtitles.english: Really? Look, I don't. Well, it can't be helped, it's your birthday after all. I'll believe in our 2nd gen bond!

subtitles.original: 可愛いねスバル。二期生の絆だもんね！あ、チョコ先生！そうだよ、ほらこっちおいで。うん。
subtitles.english: You're cute, Subaru. Our 2nd gen bond! Ah, Choco-sensei! That's right, come over here. Yeah.

subtitles.original: いいよ。ちょっと優しくしてね、ちょっと優しく置いて？
subtitles.english: Okay. Be a bit gentle, okay? Put me down gently?

subtitles.original: せーの、えい！なんか固いな。ちょっと…ねえ！何やってんの！？
subtitles.english: One, two, hey! It's a bit hard. Wait... hey! What are you doing!?

subtitles.original: チョコね、あの今日は北京ダック食べるって決めてたの。
subtitles.english: Choco, you know, decided to eat Peking Duck today.

subtitles.original: いやいやいや待って待って待って！あっちっちっちっ！ごめんね！
subtitles.english: No, no, no, wait, wait, wait! It's hot, hot, hot! Sorry!

subtitles.original: 当たり前だろ！やめてんじゃねーんだよ、お前サイコパスか？マジで！
subtitles.english: Of course it is! I'm not telling you to stop, are you a psychopath? Seriously!

subtitles.original: まあまあ、スバル、よしよしよしよし。お誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: There, there, Subaru. Good girl. Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: ありがと、スバル。
subtitles.english: Thank you, Subaru.

subtitles.original: て、あれ？スバル？スバル？
subtitles.english: Wait, eh? Subaru? Subaru?

subtitles.original: スバル？もしかして…
subtitles.english: Subaru? Maybe...

subtitles.original: ね、ちょっと…こういう時は知ってるわよチョコ。人工呼吸をすれば生き返るって。じゃあ早速…
subtitles.english: Wait... in times like this, Choco knows what to do. If I do mouth-to-mouth resuscitation, you'll come back to life. Well then...

subtitles.original: うわぁぁぁぁ！やめてやめてやめてやめて！ちょっと待って待って待って！チョコ先ニンニクの匂いもすごいしあと何かあの…
subtitles.english: Uwahhhh! Stop it, stop it! Wait, wait, wait! Choco-sen, your breath smells like garlic and something...
